document_data.name: Swamp Deer
document_data.genrefs: <ref group="note">The swamp deer's statistics are given as a modified version of the [[antelope]] statistics in [[Dungeon magazine 53|''Dungeon'' #53]]: "[[Dungeon magazine 53/Steelheart|Steelheart]]".
document_data.mainbody: '''Swamp deer''' were a small species of [[deer]] that inhabitanted swampy areas.<ref name="DunMag53-p57 />
document_data.Description: Swamp deer were quite small, standing {{SI|3|feet|c|long=yes}} at the shoulder. They were well-camouflaged and could blend into their swampy habitats.<ref name="DunMag53-p57 />
document_data.Behavior: When another creature got close to a swamp deer, it would freeze in place, allowing it to take full advantage of its camouflage and making it surprisingly hard to spot. Any sudden movement would then spook the deer, causing it to flee.<ref name="DunMag53-p57 />

Ecology.Homelands: They could be found in the boggy parts of [[Vaasa]] during the summer months.<ref name="DunMag53-p57 />
